operator: Cuban Air Force - Fuerza Aérea del Ejército de Cuba (1952-1961)
circumstances:
Shortly after takeoff from a military camp based at Colombia, the airplane stalled and crashed in a field, killing both pilots.
Crew:
Lt B. R. Sardinãs,
Lt C. G. Acosta.
probable_cause: It was reported that the accident was caused by an engine failure.
